name: babylonian-image-library
summary: A Python library that generates unique images based on a given seed or address. It also provides functionality to generate random addresses, which can be used to create random images.

name: climan
summary: Cross-platform config and manager for click console utilities.

name: clipassgen
summary: Console Smart Passwords Generator. Cross-platform console utility for generating cryptographically strong, recoverable, smart passwords.

name: clipassman
summary: Cross-platform console Smart Password manager and generator.

name: commandex
summary: A cross-platform library for creation, storage, management of commands and command packages. Execution of commands, parsing of files with command packages.

name: commandman
summary: Console utility for working with command packages. Storage, execution, autorun.

name: commandpack
summary: A cross-platform library for creation, storage, management of commands and command packages. Execution of commands, parsing of files with command packages.

name: github-ssh-key
summary: GitHub ssh key manager. Console utility for creating, getting, testing, using public ssh keys for GitHub.

name: smart-2fa-secure
summary: Advanced Two-Factor Authentication system with enhanced security features.

name: smart-babylon-library
summary: A Python library for creating and manipulating text libraries, inspired by the Library of Babel concept and my own concept of Smart Passwords.

name: smart-ip-info
summary: A simple tool to get information about IP addresses.

name: smart-redis-storage
summary: Convenient work with Redis.

name: smart-text-randomizer
summary: Smart Text Randomizer.

name: smart-tsp-benchmark
summary: Smart TSP Benchmark is a professional algorithm testing infrastructure with customizable scenarios and detailed metrics.

name: smart-tsp-solver
summary: A high-performance Python library for solving the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using novel heuristic approaches. Features advanced algorithms that outperform classical methods by ~25% on real-world clustered data while maintaining practical computational efficiency.

name: smartauthen
summary: Smart, simple, lightweight, secure cross-platform authentication for any application.

name: smartcliapp
summary: Cross-platform library of tools for creating console applications, based on the click library.

name: smartexecutorlib
summary: Smart executors.

name: smartpasslib
summary: Cross-platform library for generating smart passwords.

name: smartpathlibrary
summary: Library for working with paths to files and folders.

name: smartprinter
summary: Cross-platform smart printer for console applications

name: smartrandom
summary: Random data generators. Allows you to generate random strings of a given length from letters, numbers and symbols, as well as randomize text. Helps generate passwords, service codes (for example, for sending via SMS), hashes and much more. Generates smart, recoverable passwords.

name: smarttextdecorator
summary: A cross-platform library for decorating strings and displaying them beautifully in the console. Generates and displays lines to the full width of the console with the specified text and a placeholder character. Generates and displays a line with the specified text, decorated at the top and bottom with filler characters along the length of the line. Use for beautiful design of console applications.
